short_summary: The Government of Canada intends to solicit proposals for the purchase of office furniture requesting quoted deliveries to Regina, SK.
description: Purchase and delivery of office furniture requisitioned, partially to support collaborative work spaces, including desks and tables.,Due date for receipt of requests for clarification January 12, 2023, prior to this solicitations closure, the interested supplier submit an practice solicitation proposal outlining the solutions that will be offered to meet the required procurements.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Procurement Reference Number
 PW-22-01006854 Amendment 1

## Solicitation Number
10221354

## Notice Type
Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

## Tender Description (Requetes, Description du Acheteur):
Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

Canadian Heritage (PCH) is soliciting proposals from qualified suppliers for the purchase and delivery of office furniture to:

- Address: 400-1975 Scarth Street, Regina, SK S4P 2H1
- Tentative Delivery Date: January 27, 2023

The scope of work includes the supply, delivery, and installation of the following office furniture products under Canadian Heritage's Product Category 2 (Freestanding Height Adjustable Desk/Table Products) and Category 6 (Support Space– Collaborative Furniture).

## Contact Information (Informations de Contact):
- Name: Stephanie Dupel
- Email: contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca
- Title: Stephanie Dupel
- Address: 15 ave Eddy, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0M5
- Phone: Not available

## Brief Background:
The procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is classified as unfair competition under Tier 2 - Limited Tendering.
